H0.text: who are the australia 's got talent judges. David Walliams

H1.text: who are the australia 's got talent judges. Dannii Minogue

H2.text: who are the australia 's got talent judges. Kyle Sandilands

H3.text: who are the australia 's got talent judges. Ian Dickson

A4.text: In 2007, Minogue was hired by Simon Cowell to become a judge on the Seven Network talent show Australia's Got Talent along with Red Symons and Tom Burlinson.

A5.text: Brian McFadden and Kyle Sandilands took the places of Red Symons and Tom Burlinson.

A6.text: In January 2010, it was announced that Sandilands and Brian McFadden would be the new judges on the fourth season of Australia's Got Talent, replacing former judges Tom Burlinson and Red Symons.

A7.text: In September 2022, Sandilands was announced as a returning judge for the Seven Network's revival of the series for 2023.
